basics.name: Dr Rahmat Ullah
basics.label: Lecturer in Computer Science
basics.summary: Lecturer in Computer Science at the University of Essex specialising in AI, computational imaging, biomedical signal processing, and machine learning for digital health.

work.summary: Teaching and research in software systems, AI, and digital health technologies.
highlights: Lead and deliver undergraduate teaching modules.
Contribute to interdisciplinary digital health research projects.

courses: Data-driven imaging pipelines for translational healthcare applications
